contentrichtext.text: The title '''Baron Percy''' has been created several times in the [[Peerage of England]]. The first, in 1066 a [[English feudal barony|Feudal Barony]] rather than a [[peerage]], became extinct in 1299. The second, in 1299, became extinct in 1517. The third, in 1557, became extinct in 1670. The present creation was in 1722, by writ of summons. ==Barons Percy, first Creation (1066)== *{{Link-interwiki|en=William de Percy, 1st Baron Percy|lang=fr|lang_title=Guillaume de Percy (conquête)}} (d. 1096) *[[Alan de Percy, 2nd Baron Percy]] (ca. 1069–1135) *[[William de Percy, 3rd Baron Percy]] (d. ca. 1150) *[[William de Percy, 4th Baron Percy]] (1112–1168) *[[Agnes de Percy, Baroness Percy]] (1134-1205) married [[Joscelin of Louvain]] (d.c. 1189) *[[Richard de Percy|Richard de Percy, 5th Baron Percy]] (1166-1243), signatory to [[Magna Carta]]. *[[William de Percy, 6th Baron Percy]] (1193–1245) *[[Henry de Percy, 7th Baron Percy]] (1228–1272) *[[Henry de Percy, 8th Baron Percy]] (1273–1314) (1299 created Baron Percy of Alnwick) ==Barons Percy (of Alnwick), second Creation (1299)== *[[Henry de Percy, 1st Baron Percy]] (1273–1314) *[[Henry de Percy, 2nd Baron Percy]] (1300–1351) *[[Henry de Percy, 3rd Baron Percy]] (1320–1368) *[[Henry Percy, 1st Earl of Northumberland|Henry Percy, 4th Baron Percy]] (1341–1408) (1377 created (1st) [[Earl of Northumberland]]) until 1527 see: [[Earl of Northumberland]] (2nd to 5th) ==Barons Percy (of Alnwick), third Creation (1557)== ''see [[Earl of Northumberland]], 7th – 11th'' ==Barons Percy, fourth Creation (1722)== [[baronies created by error|This barony was created by error]], when the 7th Duke of Somerset was called to Parliament in the barony Percy, which was believed to have been last held by his mother, [[Elizabeth Seymour, Duchess of Somerset|Elizabeth]]. *[[Algernon Seymour, 7th Duke of Somerset|Algernon Seymour, 1st Baron Percy, 7th Duke of Somerset]] (1684–1750) *[[Elizabeth Percy, Duchess of Northumberland|Elizabeth Seymour, 2nd Baroness Percy]] (1716–1776) *[[Hugh Percy, 2nd Duke of Northumberland|Hugh Percy, 3rd Baron Percy, 2nd Duke of Northumberland]] (1742–1817) *[[Hugh Percy, 3rd Duke of Northumberland|Hugh Percy, 4th Baron Percy, 3rd Duke of Northumberland]] (1785–1847) *[[Algernon Percy, 4th Duke of Northumberland|Algernon Percy, 5th Baron Percy, 4th Duke of Northumberland]] (1792–1865) *[[John Stewart-Murray, 7th Duke of Atholl|John James Hugh Henry Stewart-Murray, 6th Baron Percy, 7th Duke of Atholl]] (1840–1917) *[[John Stewart-Murray, 8th Duke of Atholl|John George Stewart-Murray, 7th Baron Percy, 8th Duke of Atholl]] (1871–1942) *[[James Stewart-Murray, 9th Duke of Atholl|James Thomas Stewart-Murray, 8th Baron Percy, 9th Duke of Atholl]] (1879–1957) *[[Hugh Percy, 10th Duke of Northumberland|Hugh Algernon Percy, 9th Baron Percy, 10th Duke of Northumberland]] (1914–1988) *[[Henry Percy, 11th Duke of Northumberland|Henry Alan Walter Richard Percy, 10th Baron Percy, 11th Duke of Northumberland]] (1953–1995) *[[Ralph Percy, 12th Duke of Northumberland|Ralph George Algernon Percy, 11th Baron Percy, 12th Duke of Northumberland]] (b. 1956) ==References== *{{Rayment|date=February 2012}} *[http://www.thePeerage.com thePeerage.com website]
